Posts.Content: i am sorry you had to find your way here as we all did . I look at cancer as just what it is . it didnt ask what sex so we would get the right cancer i sure hope every thing come back good for you. we need your input . i am still afraid and will alway be afraid that it will come back.i am thankful you feel free to talk to us thanks milk.

Posts.Title: Port and Chemo

Posts.Content: Have all kinds of fun on the beach. I need some more info help please. My sister has a Rose of Sharon Bush and it has a white power mold all over the leaves and little black worm in the flower buds. All the leaves seemed to just swivelled up, stayed green a long time then died. Also, in the yard is an avacoda tree and it seems to have the same white powder mold. I thought you might know whatshould be done about it....she is in New Orleans, Louisiana. (by the way I have plenty of bling and no place to go....boohoo)
